definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
variant of 視|视[shi4]/variant of 示[shi4]

sentences.english: Make sure none of the audio components are positioned too close to the TV set.
sentences.chinese: 确认各声频设备是否太靠近电视机。

sentences.english: Neil: There's also the world's largest collection of TVs.
sentences.chinese: 这里还有世界收藏量最广最大的各种电视机。

sentences.english: This TV set is not duty-free.
Make a commitment to turning off the TV and spending some quality time with your loved ones.
sentences.chinese: 约定好关掉电视机，与家人共渡一段高质量的时光。

sentences.english: Do you think your TV screen is wearing out ?
sentences.chinese: 你看你的电视机显象管逐渐老化了吗？

sentences.english: The living room was dark, except for some light flickering out of the muted television set.
sentences.chinese: 客厅很黑，只有没声音的电视机在忽闪忽闪地发着光。

sentences.english: But smart-phones and internet-connected television sets have changed that.
sentences.chinese: 但是智能手机和网络电视机改变了人们这一想法。

sentences.english: The laundry is fresh, the bathtubs are pristine and there’s even a treadmill and a TV with HBO.
sentences.chinese: 这里还有全新的洗衣机，浴缸，跑步机和电视机。

sentences.english: The TV set cost him 5000 yuan.
I got carried away and started shouting at the television.
sentences.chinese: 我激动得不能自持，冲着电视机大叫起来。

sentences.english: It took Mr. Wang about three hours to put the TV set right yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天王师傅花了大约三个小时才把那台电视机修好。

sentences.english: Television is available in each of the hotel rooms as an extra.
sentences.chinese: 旅馆每个房间都有电视机作为额外优待。

sentences.english: The invention also openly adopts the television with the non engine inducing key-press.
sentences.chinese: 本发明还公开采用该非机械式感应按键的电视机。

sentences.english: The television is too loud, turn the volume down.
sentences.chinese: 电视机的声音太响了，把音量放小一点。

sentences.english: Neil: And there's the world's largest collection of TVs.
sentences.chinese: 这里还有世界收藏量最广最大的各种电视机。

sentences.english: There is a TV set, a stereo system and a number of chairs in the sitting room.
sentences.chinese: 客厅里有一台电视机，一套组合音响和一些椅子。

definition: CRT used in TV or computer monitor/picture tube/kinescope
air conditioning/air conditioner (including units that have a heating mode)/CL:臺|台[tai2]
set-top box/decoder for digital or satellite TV signal etc
